createnamespace.name: CreateNamespace
createnamespace.description: Grants permission to create a namespace

createtable.name: CreateTable
createtable.description: Grants permission to create a table

createtablebucket.name: CreateTableBucket
createtablebucket.description: Grants permission to create a table bucket

deletenamespace.name: DeleteNamespace
deletenamespace.description: Grants permission to delete a namespace

deletetable.name: DeleteTable
deletetable.description: Grants permission to delete a table

deletetablebucket.name: DeleteTableBucket
deletetablebucket.description: Grants permission to delete a table bucket

deletetablebucketpolicy.name: DeleteTableBucketPolicy
deletetablebucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a policy on a table bucket

deletetablepolicy.name: DeleteTablePolicy
deletetablepolicy.description: Grants permission to delete a policy on a table

getnamespace.name: GetNamespace
getnamespace.description: Grants permission to get a namespace

gettable.name: GetTable
gettable.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table

gettablebucket.name: GetTableBucket
gettablebucket.description: Grants permission to retrieve a table bucket

gettablebucketmaintenanceconfiguration.name: GetTableBucketMaintenanceConfiguration
gettablebucketmaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve a maintenance configuration on a table bucket

gettablebucketpolicy.name: GetTableBucketPolicy
gettablebucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a policy on a table bucket

gettabledata.name: GetTableData
gettabledata.description: Grants permission to read metadata and data objects from a table storage endpoint using S3 APIs

gettablemaintenanceconfiguration.name: GetTableMaintenanceConfiguration
gettablemaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve a maintenance configuration on a table

gettablemaintenancejobstatus.name: GetTableMaintenanceJobStatus
gettablemaintenancejobstatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve the status of maintenance jobs on a table

gettablemetadatalocation.name: GetTableMetadataLocation
gettablemetadatalocation.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata location of a table

gettablepolicy.name: GetTablePolicy
gettablepolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve a policy on a table

listtablebuckets.name: ListTableBuckets
listtablebuckets.description: Grants permission to list table buckets

puttablebucketmaintenanceconfiguration.name: PutTableBucketMaintenanceConfiguration
puttablebucketmaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to put a maintenance configuration on a table bucket

puttablebucketpolicy.name: PutTableBucketPolicy
puttablebucketpolicy.description: Grants permission to create or overwrite a policy on a table bucket

puttabledata.name: PutTableData
puttabledata.description: Grants permission to write metadata and data objects to a table storage endpoint using S3 APIs

puttablemaintenanceconfiguration.name: PutTableMaintenanceConfiguration
puttablemaintenanceconfiguration.description: Grants permission to put a maintenance configuration on a table

puttablepolicy.name: PutTablePolicy
puttablepolicy.description: Grants permission to create or overwrite a policy on a table

renametable.name: RenameTable
renametable.description: Grants permission to rename a table or move a table across namespaces

updatetablemetadatalocation.name: UpdateTableMetadataLocation
updatetablemetadatalocation.description: Grants permission to update the metadata location of a table
